header.label: OUR CAPABILITIES
header.title: Machine Park & Production Capacity
header.subtitle: High-precision CNC machining capabilities for the aviation and defense industries.

summary.description: EMOF Teknoloji provides end-to-end solutions for the production of critical parts with 3 and 5-axis CNC machines, CMM measurement infrastructure, and aviation-focused process engineering.

machining.title: CNC Machining Capabilities
items: Machining of aluminum, steel, titanium, and nickel alloys
Scalable capacity from single-piece prototypes to mass production
Process engineering focused on tool life and process stability

quality.title: Measurement & Quality Infrastructure
items: Full-dimensional measurement and reporting with CMM
Traceable measuring instruments and periodic calibration
AS9100 compliant documentation and record management
First Article Inspection (FAI) and verification according to customer specifications

materials.title: Materials & Application Areas
items: Steel and stainless steel endurance parts
UAV, helicopter, satellite, and industrial machinery applications

machines.name: 5-Axis Vertical Machining Center
machines.notes: Suitable for aviation structural parts and complex geometries.

machines.name: 3-Axis Vertical Machining Center
machines.notes: For medium-large sized fuselage and bracket parts.

machines.name: CNC Turning Center
machines.type: CNC turning for shafts, rings, and rotational parts
machines.notes: Ideal for fasteners and flange-type parts.

machines.name: 3D CMM Measurement Device
machines.notes: Reported, traceable measurement capability for critical dimensions.

cta.title: Are you looking for the right capability for your parts?
cta.text: Share your technical drawings and project requirements with us; let's plan the most suitable process and cost structure together for production complying with aviation standards.
